name: MIS Establishment Account Statement
description:
Shows all Prisoners Monies transactions for a day grouped by account e.g. Private Cash, Spends and Savings. It shows the opening balance, then each transaction, in descending order, listing the user, transaction type, the amount, whether credit or debit , a running balance and then finally the closing balance for that account..

FIN0025 â€“ v00.01.01 Last Modified: 27/11/13

dataset.name: MIS Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: Report Variant 117451.RS does not have corresponding dataset 3376115/DP2
